summary: This bill, the Food Distribution Program on Indian Reservations (FDPIR) Act of 2025, amends the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into self-determination contracts and self-governance agreements with Indian entities. This allows these entities to administer the food distribution program on their reservations. The bill outlines definitions, eligibility requirements, commodity purchase guidelines, and reporting requirements. It also addresses the application of governing law and terminates existing demonstration programs related to FDPIR.
